title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-1.2 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-1.2 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of Part 645 or 646, or its application
to any person or circumstance, is held invalid, it is hereby expressly declared
to be the intent of the commission that the remainder of Parts 645 and/or 646, and the application thereof to any persons or circumstances, shall not be
affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
